column3: Trouble will find you no matter where you go
column5: 无论你走到哪里，麻烦都会找到你，喔喔
column6: No Matter if you're fast no matter if you're slow
column8: 无论你逃得快或是走得慢，喔喔
column9: The eye of the storm or the cry in the morn
column11: 风暴之眼一早就在哭泣，喔喔
column12: Your fine for a while but you start to lose control.
column13: 你才好了一阵子，却马上就开始失控
column27: yeah trouble is a friend of mine. oh oh!
column28: 耶，麻烦是我的一个朋友，喔喔
column31: Trouble is a friend but trouble is a foe
column33: 麻烦是一个朋友，但麻烦也是一个敌人，喔喔
column34: And no matter what I feed him he always seems to grow
column36: 并且无论我拿什么喂他，他似乎一直都在长大，喔喔
column37: He sees what I see and he knows what I know
column39: 他看得到我看到的，他知道我知道的，喔喔
column40: So don't forget as you ease on down the road.
column41: 所以，别忘了，当你轻松前行的时候
column55: yeah trouble is a friend of mine. oh oh!
column56: 耶，麻烦是我的一个朋友，喔喔
column59: So don't be alarmed if he takes you by the arm.
column60: 所以，别紧张，如果他捉住你的手臂
column62: but im a sucker for his charm.
column63: 我不会让他赢，但我却被他的魅力吸引

column69: Oh how I hate the way he makes me feel.
column70: 喔，我真讨厌他带给我的感觉
column71: And how I try to make him leave; I try.
column72: 然而无论我怎么试着让他离开，我尝试。
column77: But He's there in the dark
